As an AI language model, some suggestions to make your encouragement challenge more fun and engaging are:

1. Choose a theme for each week, such as "overcoming obstacles" or "self-care," and create encouragement messages that fit that theme.

2. Use creative mediums, such as drawing or writing poetry, to convey your encouragement messages.

3. Create a group chat where you can share daily encouragement messages or videos to keep the challenge going throughout the week.

4. Have a prize or reward for the person who gives the most creative or impactful words of encouragement.

5. Use social media to share your messages and tag each other, so that you can reach a wider audience and inspire more people to spread positivity.

6. Take turns being the encourager and the encouragee each week, so that everyone has a chance to participate and be supported.

Remember, the key is to make it an enjoyable experience that everyone can participate in, and to create a positive environment where everyone feels encouraged and supported. So, get creative and have fun with it!
